amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to reduce the Salaries and Expenses of the Federal Trade Commission to FY19 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Federal Trade Commission, Salaries and Expenses, by $66,830,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 257 (Roll no. 628).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 257 (Roll no. 628).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
